properties.name: callableTimes
properties.description: The list of CallableTimes for which it is acceptable to place outbound calls.

properties.name: timeSlots
properties.description: The time intervals for which it is acceptable to place outbound calls.

properties.name: startTime
properties.description: The start time of the interval as an ISO-8601 string, i.e. HH:mm:ss

properties.name: stopTime
properties.description: The end time of the interval as an ISO-8601 string, i.e. HH:mm:ss

properties.name: day
properties.description: The day of the interval. Valid values: [1-7], representing Monday through Sunday

properties.name: timeZoneId
properties.description: The time zone for the time slots; for example, Africa/Abidjan
